description: Your next training expedition is to an arctic region called Yeti Pass. If you can bring that lonely snowman to life, it may make a good guide!

puzzles.description: Make Dash switch back and forth between the two eye ring patterns every 0.1 s.
puzzles.introduction: Let's give the snowman a snowflake eye pattern!

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the Eye Ring states together using two Wait For cues set to 0.1 s.

puzzles.description: After the Listener, make Dash turn off the eye lights when a clap is heard. Then make Dash automatically turn the lights off.

hints.description: Link the Listener to the Eye Ring using a Clap Heard cue. Link the Eye Ring to the Lights Off state using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After turning the lights off, make Dash turn on one eye light after waiting 3.0 s.
puzzles.introduction: The Listener waits until something triggers it, then it moves Dash into a new state.

hints.description: Link the state with a Wait For cue set to 3.0 s.

puzzles.description: Make Dash turn on more eye lights every 2.0 s until Dash is smiling.
puzzles.introduction: At first, the snowman looks like a normal snowman.

hints.description: Link the Eye Ring states together using Wait For cues set to 2.0 s.

puzzles.description: After the smile, make Dash automatically turn on white lights. Then make Dash automatically sing "Hello, hello, hello, hello..."
puzzles.introduction: The snowman is coming to life. Check out the eyes!

puzzles.description: After Dash sings "Hello, hello, hello, hello...", make Dash instantly dance left.

hints.description: Link the state with an Instant cue to make the song and dance happen at the same time.
